name: politico
text:
Trump accused Drudge of spreading rumors that the president had gone to Walter Reed Medical Center last year over “mini-strokes.”

“Drudge didn’t support me in 2016, and I hear he doesn’t support me now,” he tweeted. “Maybe that’s why he is doing poorly.” https://t.co/5EY9bKfqJd

name: politico
text:
Trump's campaign also called for CNN to fire Joe Lockhart, saying he had spread the story.

Lockhart tweeted last night wondering whether Trump had had “a stroke which he is hiding from the American public,” but denied reporting any kind of stroke as fact. https://t.co/5EY9bKfqJd

name: politico
text: Facebook has taken down a network of fake accounts that appeared to target progressives. The accounts were tied to the troll farm accused of mounting an anti-Hillary Clinton propaganda effort in 2016 and also recruited freelancers to write news stories https://t.co/FqUPLJ6FII

name: politico
text:
Mexico has been hit hard by the pandemic – and Covid-19 has preyed on their factory workers. In those communities, “if you don't die from the virus, you will die from poverty,” journalist @gaminjares told our reporter @renurayasam at the border.

https://t.co/lWU6ZFcA3j https://t.co/mIWh6fvbL2

name: politico
text: The Department of Homeland Security's cybersecurity arm and the FBI said they've seen no cyberattacks on voter registration databases this year https://t.co/ZxWA43PZtU

name: politico
text:
Mexico has recorded nearly 600K virus cases and nearly 65K deaths, though most agree that the official stats are missing a huge number of cases and deaths because of a lack of testing and record keeping.

More in our nightly coronavirus newsletter:  https://t.co/TzxUNVXgLv

name: politico
text:
Kyle Rittenhouse was charged with homicide after shooting three protesters last week, two of them fatally.

But today in Kenosha, Trump supporters called him a patriot. They said he was a hero. They thanked him for defending the city. https://t.co/Sl4sR9xY9c

name: politico
text: House Ways and Means Chairman Richard Neal has won his Democratic primary in Massachusetts, defeating his liberal primary challenger, Alex Morse https://t.co/tO0tRyPgrN https://t.co/2R4YAq6YJT

name: politico
text:
Richard Neal, the House’s top tax-writer, came under fire from progressives, who saw him as too close to industry and slow to pursue Trump’s tax returns. 

Morse, the 31yo mayor of Holyoke, Mass., was endorsed by Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez & other big names. https://t.co/tO0tRyPgrN https://t.co/0kMCiDTXUo

name: politico
text:
While visiting Kenosha, Wisconsin today, Trump blamed “violent mobs” for damaging businesses and public buildings and throwing bricks at police officers.

“These are not acts of peaceful protest but really domestic terror,” he said. https://t.co/4T9V6h8Sfy

name: politico
text: Breaking: Sen. Ed Markey has defeated Rep. Joe Kennedy in the Democratic Senate primary in Massachusetts, notching a big win for progressives who made Markey's campaign a national cause this summer https://t.co/avajRV4tjc https://t.co/pNA9ejF4dH

name: politico
text:
Here's where Ed Markey and Joe Kennedy stood at 38% reporting.

Falwell is one of the most prominent evangelical supporters of President Trump. The former university leader's wife, Becki, has served on the advisory board of Women for Trump

text:

text: In losing his Senate race, Joe Kennedy III has freed his family from a political burden it has struggled to escape https://t.co/GcmbQaRAAi

name: politico
text: President Donald Trump pointed on Wednesday to Rep. Joe Kennedy's defeat in a Democratic primary as evidence that the party has come to be dominated by the "Radical Left" https://t.co/ldet9Byi6G

text: Democratic lawmakers are urging the Canadian government to ensure border officials allow residents of two geographically isolated communities to transit through Canada to access the rest of the U.S. https://t.co/cR1ewPPmU2

name: politico
text:
Sen. Ed Markey beat back Rep. Joe Kennedy's Massachusetts primary challenge last night, notching a significant victory for the Democratic Party's left wing as the favorite candidate of young liberals taking on the party establishment
https://t.co/U3IwhGKTdl

name: politico
text: "Tonight is more than just a celebration of a movement," Markey said in his victory speech. "It is a reaffirmation of the need to have a movement, a progressive movement, of young people demanding radical change, demanding justice.” https://t.co/SVtiCI70Ft

name: politico
text: The senator is a good man,” Kennedy said last night. “I'm grateful for the debates, for his commitment to our commonwealth and for the energy and enthusiasm that he brought to this race." https://t.co/SVtiCI70Ft

name: politico

name: politico
text: For the record: This corrects a deleted tweet that misstated that day that Rendon issued his apology.
